summary: This bill, the Institute for Telecommunication Sciences Codification Act, aims to codify the Institute for Telecommunication Sciences (ITS) within the National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA). It mandates the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information to operate the ITS as a test center for spectrum research and sharing. Furthermore, the bill directs the establishment of an initiative to support the development of emergency communication and tracking technologies, focusing on locating individuals in confined spaces. The bill charges the Assistant Secretary with a needs assessment and report to Congress.
